sentences.cn: ...诸如帕金森综合症的神经系统混乱症状。

sentences.en: Aim : To measure quantitatively limbs tremor with neurological disease.
sentences.cn: 目的: 定量分析神经科患者肢体震颤.

sentences.en: Clinical neurological function wad assessed with combined behavioral score ( CBS ).
sentences.cn: 应用联合行为评分 ( Combinedbehavioral score,CBS ) 评价脊髓神经运动功能.

sentences.en: Conclusion TCS ~ , s diagnosis includes lumbar - sacral malformations, spinal neurological impairment, typical MIR findings.
sentences.cn: 结论脊髓栓系综合征的诊断主要依据腰骶部的畸形 、 脊髓神经功能损害和典型脊髓MIR表现.

sentences.en: Determine client's neurological status, including level of consciousness ( LOC ).
sentences.cn: 评估病人循环系统状况, 包括 心尖 搏动、 心电图 和外周脉搏.

sentences.en: From them I heard about transplants, neurological impediments, cancer, and post - surgery complications.
sentences.cn: 从他们那里我听说了有关移植 、 神经障碍 、 癌症以及术后并发症的事情.

sentences.en: In this study authors confirmed that preoperative neurological status impacts perioperative morbidity.
sentences.cn: 通过本研究,作者们确信术前神经系统状态确实影响着围手术期并发症的发病率.

sentences.en: Injury of the cervical spine may cause serious complications and neurological sequelae.
sentences.cn: 摘要颈椎受伤可能会导致严重并发症及神经缺损.

sentences.en: Many puppies die of Distemper and others are left with neurological problems.
sentences.cn: 很多幼狗死于该病,幸存的狗狗常有神经系统方面的问题.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristics of 26 cases paraneoplastic neurological syndrome.
sentences.cn: 目的了解神经系统副肿瘤综合征患者的临床特点.

sentences.en: Other beta - amyloids are implicated in neurological diseases such as Alzheimer's and Parkinson's.
sentences.cn: 其他β - 淀粉样蛋白多与神经系统疾病如阿尔茨海默症和帕金森症发病有关.

sentences.en: Sc ? NTFs could improve neurological outcome after traumatic spinal cord injury in rats.
sentences.cn: Sc-NTFs使脊髓损伤后神经功能有显著改善.

sentences.en: The rate of neurological complications increased by Spetzler - Martin grade.
sentences.cn: 术后早期新的神经功能障碍发生率随着Spetzler-Martin级别升高而增加.

sentences.en: The results were analyzed with basal clinical conditions and neurological function outcomes.
sentences.cn: 显像结果与临床基础状况和随后的神经功能改变对比分析.

sentences.en: There are also serious neurological complications.
sentences.cn: 还有许多神经上的严重并发症.

sentences.en: These symptoms may last several weeks, and neurological 1 effects may be permanent.
sentences.cn: 这些症状可能持续几个星期, 对神经系统的影响可能是永久性的.
